name: Faction Wars (GingerBearGames)
description:
Welcome to Faction Wars - A turn based local multiplayer game! 
 Use your wits to outsmart your opponent in a ferocious battle across a grid based game arena spanning the battlefield between your civilization and theirs.

The aim of this game is to give exciting short multiplayer battles for players to enjoy lasting around 10 minutes each with random elements and timers to keep the game fast paced and interesting.  



You win by defeating the opposing King - You keep your own King safe by recruiting reinforcements from your garrison.


Each Faction will have it's own unique style and colour scheme and hope that in the future will be customizable with unlockable weapons and outfits earned by your achievements in battle!

Initially the game is being developed initially for PC but then hopes of iOS and eventually online multiplayer.

***THE GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS SO PLEASE EXPECT SOME BUGS***
